All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
DatabaseController
UserRegistry handles the storage and retrieval of users.
ForbiddenAdvice
ForbiddenAdvice provides responses to forbidden requests.
ForbiddenException
A ForbiddenException is thrown when a request attempts to access or modify resources it is not allowed to do so with.
FsuviusApplication
FsuviusApplication tells Spring how to configure and start the application.
FsuviusController
FsuviusController defines and implements the program's API mappings.
FsuviusMap
FsuviusMap contains user-modifiable constants that are used elsewhere in the program.
IPFilter
IPFilter provides functionality for checking IPs against a predefined allow-list.
Log
Log provides simple functionality for logging events by class.
NotFoundAdvice
NotFoundAdvice provides responses to requests that attempt to access content that does not exist.
NotFoundException
A NotFoundException is thrown when a request attempts to access a resource that does not exist.
RateLimitAdvice
RateLimitAdvice provides responses to throttled requests.
RateLimitException
A RateLimitException is thrown when a client request is throttled.
User
User represents an account in the system with an ID, name, and balance.
